content: आप्रच्छ् {c6c} <ab>A.</ab> {@--1@} To bid adieu, bid farewell; आपृच्छस्व प्रियसखममुं तुंगमालिंग्य शैलं <ls>Me. 12</ls>; <ls>R. 8. 49</ls>, <ls n="R.">12. 103</ls>; <ls>Māl. 7.</ls>; <ls>Bk. 14. 63.</ls> {@--2@} To salute on receiving, but particularly parting with a visitor (साधो यामि इति वचनं). {@--3@} To ask. {@--4@} To extol.
